vn.map4d.map.core

Class MFUiSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • vn.map4d.map.core.MFUiSettings

  • public final class MFUiSettings
extends java.lang.Object
    Settings for the user interface of a Map4D. To obtain this interface, call getUiSettings().

    • Method Detail

      • isMyLocationButtonEnabled

        public boolean isMyLocationButtonEnabled()
        Gets whether the my-location button is enabled/disabled.
        Returns:
        true if the my-location button is enabled; false if the my-location button is disabled.

      • isZoomGesturesEnabled

        public boolean isZoomGesturesEnabled()
        Gets whether zoom gestures are enabled/disabled.
        Returns:
        true if zoom gestures are enabled; false if zoom gestures are disabled.

      • isRotateGesturesEnabled

        public boolean isRotateGesturesEnabled()
        Gets whether rotate gestures are enabled/disabled.
        Returns:
        true if rotate gestures are enabled; false if rotate gestures are disabled.

      • isTiltGesturesEnabled

        public boolean isTiltGesturesEnabled()

      • isScrollGesturesEnabled

        public boolean isScrollGesturesEnabled()
        Gets whether scroll gestures are enabled/disabled.
        Returns:
        true if scroll gestures are enabled; false if scroll gestures are disabled.

      • setMyLocationButtonEnabled

        public void setMyLocationButtonEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enables or disables the my-location button. The my-location button causes the camera to move such that the user's location is in the center of the map. If the button is enabled, it is only shown when the my-location layer is enabled. By default, the my-location button is enabled.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable the my-location button; false to disable the my-location button.

      • setAllGesturesEnabled

        public void setAllGesturesEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Sets the preference for all gestures should be enabled or disabled. By default, zoom all gestures are enabled.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable all gestures; false to disable all gestures.

      • setZoomGesturesEnabled

        public void setZoomGesturesEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Sets the preference for whether zoom gestures should be enabled or disabled. If enabled, users can either double tap/two-finger tap or pinch to zoom the camera. If disabled, these gestures have no effect. By default, zoom gestures are enabled.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable zoom gestures; false to disable zoom gestures.

      • setScrollGesturesEnabled

        public void setScrollGesturesEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Sets the preference for whether scroll gestures should be enabled or disabled. If enabled, users can swipe to pan the camera. If disabled, swiping has no effect By default, scroll gestures are enabled.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable scroll gestures; false to disable scroll gestures.

      • setRotateGesturesEnabled

        public void setRotateGesturesEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Sets the preference for whether rotate gestures should be enabled or disabled. If enabled, users can rotate the camera. If disabled, rotate has no effect By default, rotate gestures are enabled.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable rotate gestures; false to disable rotate gestures.

      • setTiltGesturesEnabled

        public void setTiltGesturesEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Sets the preference for whether shove gestures should be enabled or disabled. If enabled, users can swipe to shove the camera. If disabled, swiping has no effect By default, shove gestures are enabled.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true to enable shove gestures; false to disable shove gestures.
